title: Pingu: Pingu and his friends
creator_credit: Pingu Filmstudio and PINGU B V NL
brief_description: Pingu and his family and friends invite you to join them in ten of their stories of fun and games. Stories on the tape include: ‘Pingu plays ice hockey’; ‘Pingu and Pinga don’t want to go to bed’; ‘Pingu on the makeshift skis’; ‘Pingu runs away from home’; ‘Pingu builds an igloo’; ‘Pingu has music lessons from his grandfather’; ‘Pingu in the ice cave’; ‘Pingu’s tobogganing’; ‘Pingu’s grandfather is sick’; ‘Pingu at school’.
